En.GARDEVOIR_PA1_TEXT_1: When an enemy inflicts decreased movement speed or a damage-over-time effect on Gardevoir; damage that enemy one time and slow them by 40% for 3s, when triggered. This ability goes on a 8s cooldown when triggered.
En.GARDEVOIR_BA1_TEXT_1: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their Sp. Defense by 10% for 2s.
En.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_CONFUSION_TEXT_1: Gardevoir fires a piercing bolt; damaging enemies and slowing them by 35% for 1s.
En.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_PSYCHIC_TEXT_1: Gardevoir fires a blast; damaging enemies in an area on impact. The blast creates a lingering field that damages and slows enemies by 50% for 1s. Each time Psychic deals damage it reduces the target’s Special Defense by 20% for 4s, up to 60%.
En.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_MOONBLAST_TEXT_1: Gardevoir moves back while firing a blast; stunning the first enemy hit for 1.2s and damaging all enemies in a cone behind it.
En.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_TELEPORT_TEXT_1: Gardevoir teleports to a targeted area and gains a boosted attack.
En.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_PSYSHOCK_TEXT_1: Gardevoir channels three attacks at the targeted area; damaging enemies. Gardevoir's moves' cooldowns are reduced by 15% each time Psyshock hits an enemy.
En.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_PSYSHOCK_TEXT_2: Each hit of Psyshock also increases the damage of the next hit.
En.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_FUTURE_SIGHT_TEXT_1: Gardevoir creates a delayed explosion at the targeted area; damaging enemies. If Future Sight hits an enemy player (not wild), the cooldown is reduced by 75% and Gardevoir gains 40% movement speed for 1.5s.
En.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_FUTURE_SIGHT_TEXT_2: Cooldown is reset on successful hits.
En.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_FAIRY_SINGULARITY_TEXT_1: Gardevoir warps space in a large area, creating a field, damaging all enemies in the radius and pulling them towards the center 4 times. When it expires, the field damages and shoves enemies.
En.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_FAIRY_SINGULARITY_TEXT_2: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

Cn.GARDEVOIR_PA1_TEXT_1: 当敌人对 Gardevoir 造成移动速度降低或持续伤害效果时；触发时对该敌人造成 1 次伤害并使其减速 40%，持续 3 秒。此技能触发后有 8 秒的冷却时间。
Cn.GARDEVOIR_BA1_TEXT_1: 每三次攻击变为一次增强攻击。当这种增强攻击命中时，它会对效果范围内的敌人造成伤害并降低他们的 Sp。防御力提升 10%，持续 2 秒。
Cn.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_CONFUSION_TEXT_1: Gardevoir 发射了一个穿孔螺栓；对敌人造成伤害并使其减速 35%，持续 1 秒。
Cn.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_PSYCHIC_TEXT_1: Gardevoir 发出一声巨响；对影响范围内的敌人造成伤害。爆炸会产生一个挥之不去的力场，对敌人造成伤害并使其减速 50%，持续 1 秒。心灵术士每次造成伤害都会降低目标的特防 20%，持续 4 秒，最多降低 60%。
Cn.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_MOONBLAST_TEXT_1: Gardevoir 向后退，同时发射一记冲击波；击晕第一个击中的敌人 1.2 秒，并对其后方锥形范围内的所有敌人造成伤害。
Cn.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_MOONBLAST_TEXT_2: 授予沙奈朵一个持续 3 秒的护盾。
Cn.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_TELEPORT_TEXT_1: 沙奈朵传送到目标区域并获得强化攻击。
Cn.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_PSYSHOCK_TEXT_1: 沙奈朵在目标区域引导三次攻击；伤害敌人。每次精神震击击中敌人时，沙奈朵的技能冷却时间都会减少 15%。
Cn.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_PSYSHOCK_TEXT_2: Psyshock 的每一击也会增加下一击的伤害。
Cn.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_FUTURE_SIGHT_TEXT_1: 沙奈朵在目标区域制造延迟爆炸；伤害敌人。如果预知未来击中敌方玩家（非野外），则冷却时间减少 75%，沙奈朵获得 40% 移动速度，持续 1.5 秒。
Cn.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_FUTURE_SIGHT_TEXT_2: 成功命中后冷却时间重置。
Cn.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_FAIRY_SINGULARITY_TEXT_1: 沙奈朵在大范围内扭曲空间，创造一个领域，伤害半径内的所有敌人并将他们拉向中心 4 次。当它过期时，该场会伤害并推开敌人。
Cn.GARDEVOIR_MOVE_FAIRY_SINGULARITY_TEXT_2: 30% 移动速度，30% CDR，20% 最大生命值护盾
